meanings.definition: A type of sausage typically served with beer.
meanings.sent1: The bierwurst was a hit at the party, everyone loved it.
meanings.sent2: I ordered a bierwurst at the pub to enjoy with my beer.
meanings.sent3: The bierwurst told a joke to the beer, making them the perfect pair.
meanings.sent4: The bierwurst was a flavorful companion to the cold beer.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the sizzling bierwurst made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A German sausage made with pork and beef.
meanings.sent1: The butcher recommended the bierwurst for its authentic German taste.
meanings.sent2: I bought some bierwurst to cook for our Oktoberfest celebration.
meanings.sent3: The bierwurst and sauerkraut danced together on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The bierwurst was a delicious blend of pork and beef flavors.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the bierwurst on the grill filled the air with a tempting aroma.
